TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {31332=Bangladesh Under-19 captain Mahmudul Hasan (r), and coach Minhajul Abedin, speak about the England series, 9535=Born December 10, 1990, Gaibandha, 50192=Since the beginning of 2012, Ian Bell averages 34.69 when batting in the top six; among regular top-order batsmen, only Shane Watson has a lower average, 31735=Feb 12, 2008, 29946=Nov 4, 2009, 30809=Oct 11, 2009, 26506=Mahmudul Hasan is an offspinner and a right-hand batsman who took part in the 2008 Under-19 World Cup in Malaysia and was named captain for the next edition in New Zealand two years later. His team won the Plate final, beating Ireland. He successfully led the U-19 side in 2009 during their home series against Sri Lanka, Zimbabwe and England. If he can't become a professional cricketer, Hasan would like to get into business. Cricinfo Staff January 2010, 46427=4391 runs after 35, and 2354 outside top five}
